Two of the first Chinese books on plant taxonomy , Pictorial Handbook of Chinese Plants ( Chia et al .1958 ) and Dictionary of Families and Genera of Chinese Seed Plants ( How 1958 ) , simultaneously named Cannabis from China as C. sativa L.
